attributes.action: Test pregnant women for genetic screening
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister 

We would like to prevent a huge amount of babies dying every year from genetic diseases/disorders or chromosome abnormalities and believe that women of any age should be tested, before and during pregnancy, to establish whether they are likely to have a baby with a genetic disorder


Thanks on behalf of many many heartbroken parents.
